name: Giant Fire Beetle
description: The Giant Fire Beetle is a small insect with the ability to illuminate its surroundings. Its body secretes igniting mucus that can cause ongoing fire damage.
memorable: Its unique ability to shine bright light and its igniting mucus make it both a useful companion and a potential hazard.
goals: Typically found in various environments, aiming to survive and possibly assist with illumination.
relations: May be encountered alongside other small beasts in environments that benefit from light sources.
environment: Varied environments, often found in dark areas where its illumination can be beneficial.
strengths: Illuminates dark areas and can inflict ongoing fire damage through its igniting mucus ability.
weaknesses: Low hit points and poor physical attack capabilities, making it a minor threat in combat.
attacks: Can perform a weak bite or shoot igniting mucus to poison and ignite targets.
most_powerful_ability: Its Igniting Mucus, which can cause continual fire damage over multiple rounds.
senses: Possesses keen senses with a radius of 30 feet, enhancing its ability to detect nearby threats.
skills: Average stealth skill allows it to move unnoticed in its environment.
additional_information: Can serve as a minor threat due to its igniting mucus.
Illumination ability can aid adventurers in dark settings.
Low challenge rating means it poses minimal threat to experienced adventurers.
Can ignite its mucus immediately if the target takes fire damage.
Mucus can be extinguished by taking an action.
